issue.title: [CF 337] eeeeeeeeek
issue.body:
see if you can finish figuring this one out:

--print(spaceControl, spaceControl:find("%^S"), spaceControl:find("%^S`"), spaceControl:find("%^S`|"))
    if spaceControl:find("`|") then
        print("holy batman jesus")
        -- EVERYTHING is fucked up. try really hard to salvage it.
        return TMW:DeserializeData(string:gsub("`", "~`"):gsub("~`|", "~`~|"))
    elseif spaceControl:find("`") then
        print("holy batman")
        -- if spaces have become corrupt, then reformat them and... re-deserialize (lol)
        return TMW:DeserializeData(string:gsub("`", "~`"))
    elseif spaceControl:find("~|") then
        print("holy jesus")
        -- if pipe characters have been screwed up by blizzard's cute little method of escaping things combined with AS-3.0's cute way of escaping things, try to fix them.
        return TMW:DeserializeData(string:gsub("~||", "~|"))
    end


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras | Imported from CurseForge issue #337 | Raw

comments.body:
whatever, it is good enough as it is.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
